archimate:ApplicationService.name: [Spectrograph Archiving] AT Archiver Service (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
AT Archiver Service aquires pixel data in real time from the spectrograph and feeds backend services.
This is an OCS-commandable device. The service is driven by the arrival of the new exposure in the spectrograph camera. It assembles pixels into a FITS file and forwards the data to othger services supplying a real-time view of the aquired data to ther observatory and providing for archiving of the raw data into the backbone.
